results.title: Severe angioedema and respiratory distress associated with lisinopril use.
results.text_hl: Severe @DISEASE_Angioedema @DISEASE_MESH:D000799 @@@angioedema@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@respiratory distress@@@ associated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ use.

results.title: Angioedema complicating lisinopril therapy.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ presented with acute onset of @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@swelling@@@ involving the oro-facial region and @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@respiratory distress@@@ after ingestion of three doses of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ over a three day period.

citations.NLM: Nzerue MC. Angioedema complicating lisinopril therapy. Cent Afr J Med. 1992 Sep;38(9):391-2. PMID: 1338526

results.title: Daily Lisinopril vs Placebo for Prevention of Chemoradiation-Induced Pulmonary Distress in Patients With Lung Cancer (Alliance MC1221): A Pilot Double-Blind Randomized Trial.
results.journal: Int J Radiat Oncol Biol Phys
results.text_hl: Daily @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ vs Placebo for Prevention of Chemoradiation-Induced @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@Pulmonary Distress@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ With @DISEASE_Lung_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D008175 @@@Lung Cancer@@@ (Alliance MC1221): A Pilot Double-Blind Randomized Trial.
